;----------------------------
; Miscellaneous RRW coding
; added by Swordmaster 30 Jun 2013
;----------------------------
; draggable 45 degree curve and B2 switch end
0x531e0600,3,0,0x03001A00,2,0=0x531e0600,3,0,0x531e0700,3,0
0x531e0600,1,1,0x03001A00,1,0=0x531e0600,1,1,0x531e0700,1,1
;
0x531e0500,0,0,0x53100200,1,1=0x531e0500,0,0,0x531e0600,0,0
0x531e0500,2,1,0x53100200,3,0=0x531e0500,2,1,0x531e0600,2,1
;
; OverhangCurve support for inside (through-dragged) diagonal switches
0x53100c00,3,0,0x53100b00,3,0=0x53100c00,3,0,0x53100e00,3,0
0x53100c00,1,1,0x53100b00,1,1=0x53100c00,1,1,0x53100e00,1,1
;
0x03001a00,0,0,0x53100e00,3,0=0x03001a00,0,0,0x53100b00,3,0
0x03001a00,3,0,0x53100e00,1,1=0x03001a00,3,0,0x53100b00,1,1
;
0x53100c00,1,1,0x53100a00,2,0=0x53100c00,1,1,0x53100d00,2,0
0x53100c00,3,0,0x53100a00,0,1=0x53100c00,3,0,0x53100d00,0,1
;
0x53100e00,1,0,0x53100b00,3,0=0x53100b00,1,0,0x53100b00,3,0
0x53100e00,3,1,0x53100b00,1,1=0x53100b00,3,1,0x53100b00,1,1
;
0x53100e00,1,0,0x53100e00,3,0=0x53100b00,1,0,0x53100b00,3,0
0x53100e00,3,1,0x53100e00,1,1=0x53100b00,3,1,0x53100b00,1,1
;
0x53100c00,1,1,0x53100200,2,0=0x53100c00,1,1,0x53101000,1,1
0x53100c00,3,0,0x53100200,0,1=0x53100c00,3,0,0x53101000,3,0
;
0x53100e00,1,0,0x53100100,1,0=0x53100f00,1,0,0x53100100,1,0
0x53100e00,3,1,0x53100100,3,1=0x53100f00,3,1,0x53100100,3,1
;
0x53100b00,1,0,0x53100100,1,0=0x53100f00,1,0,0x53100100,1,0
0x53100b00,3,1,0x53100100,3,1=0x53100f00,3,1,0x53100100,3,1
;
0x53100e00,1,0,0x53100a00,0,1=0x53100b00,1,0,0x53100a00,0,1
0x53100e00,3,1,0x53100a00,2,0=0x53100b00,3,1,0x53100a00,2,0
;
0x53100e00,1,0,0x03AA2000,0,1=0x53100b00,1,0,0x03AA2000,0,1
0x53100e00,3,1,0x03AA2000,2,0=0x53100b00,3,1,0x03AA2000,2,0
;
0x53100e00,1,0,0x53100200,0,1=0x53100b00,1,0,0x53100200,0,1
0x53100e00,3,1,0x53100200,2,0=0x53100b00,3,1,0x53100200,2,0
